"Rough idea on how to play the game

"
"There will be two closely related words chosen the computer. One is a normal word and another one is a spy word." "Each players will be given either one of these words. Of course, the spy word will be given " "to the lesser number players. Then, each player describes the word given in turn. The first " "person to start explaining will be determined by the computer for you. After each round of " "explanation, you will discuss among others to kill a person whom all of you agree is a spy." "The game continues until all the spies are killed or number of spies become similar to number" "of normal players.

"
"Number of spies

"
"Choose a reasonable number of spies. For example, don't choose 3 spies in a game of 5 players.

"
"Blanks

"
"If you decided to include blanks in the game, some of the players will not either normal " "or spy word. There will be given a blank word instead. Number of blanks will be determined " "by the computer accordingly. We got ya!

"
"Rank, purely for fun ... 

"
"All the survivors after each round of the game will be given 10 points. Points will be updated " "after each round. Points will be reset to 0 for all players if there are new players joining or " "some players are leaving."
